questions_and_notes: Can "where land" be applied instead of "where crops"?  See comment regarding tasmaxCrop-Eday.  Note that in general "area: mean" will give a higher minimum if data are mapped to a coarser grid than the original.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 1 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where crops time: minimum within days time: mean over days
long_name: Daily Minimum Near-Surface Air Temperature over Crop Tile
comment: minimum near-surface (usually, 2 meter) air temperature (add cell_method attribute "time: min")
